definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, historically associated with notable figures such as John Wilkes, an 18th-century British politician and journalist known for his advocacy of civil liberties and parliamentary reform.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，历史上与著名人物如约翰·威尔克斯相关联，他是18世纪英国政治家和记者，以倡导公民自由和议会改革而闻名。
definitions.example_en: John Wilkes was a controversial figure who championed freedom of the press in Britain.
definitions.example_cn: 约翰·威尔克斯是一位颇具争议的人物，他为英国的新闻自由而奋斗。
